Phoenix/Skyblaze::

Phoenix stands on a cliff, staring off into space.  Skyblaze comes up 
beside her and puts a hand on her shoulder.  "What's bothering you, 
child?  You've been here for over an hour."

"Father ..." Phoenix looks at her aging kin.  "I have to go back.  I 
can't abandon Flicker - especially now that I have my memory back."

"You miss him."

"Yes."  For a while, the two stand there, looking in the direction of 
the Predacon base.

Then Skyblaze speaks up again.  "The Predacons aren't the ideal race 
to associate with.  Once they learn what you're capable of ..."

"I can't leave Flicker.  I owe him too much."

"Then I will accompany you."  Phoenix starts, and looks up at 
Skyblaze.

"What?"

"Your power is unlike any other Lumin, my dear.  You've been forced 
into the shell of a transformer, and that has changed you.  You have 
to learn to control that power, otherwise you're a constant danger to 
yourself and those around you."

"And you can ... teach me to control it?  To stop the surges?"  
Phoenix moves a little closer, hoping beyond hope.

"I will try," Skyblaze promises, hugging his daughter.  "You're all I 
have left in the universe."

The pair of them fly off, Phoenix transforming to beast mode, and 
Skyblaze returning to his natural energy-based state.
